content:
Table of Contents:
Implementation Plan for MVP of Fresh Earth Token

1. Introduction
a. Overview of the MVP project
b. Objective of the MVP
c. Budget for the MVP
2. Stage 1: Digital Twin Creation
a. Creation of digital twins for pilot project
b. Development of data management platform
c. Connecting digital twin with Farmer profile in community platform
d. On-boarding of farmers through deep data analysis
e. Creation of Fresh Earth Tokens and registration of KPIs
3. Stage 2: Verification and Validation
a. Verification of KPIs through independent audit process
b. Validation of measurement protocols for KPIs
c. Issuance of mini tokens and carbon credits
d. Integration of digital twin in project management community platform
4. Conclusion
a. Summary of the implementation plan
b. Key success factors
c. Future plans for the project

Note: The implementation plan will be further detailed and refined based on the progress and requirements of the project.
